mapper.select: select id, permission_code, permission_name from sys_permission where id = #{id}
select id, permission_code, permission_name from sys_permission limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT p.* FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_relation AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission_relation AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
SELECT pe.* FROM sys_permission pe LEFT JOIN sys_request_path_permission_relation re ON re.permission_id = pe.id LEFT JOIN sys_request_path pa ON pa.id = re.url_id WHERE pa.url = #{path}
